title: I want to Intern at Riot
body: Hey, anyone at Riot. Is there any way that I could sign up for an internship at the studio or something? Game play is not the only thing that I love about your company, and I have been interested in how the game works, and the creation of all of the wonderful things you do. Thanks! Even if I am not able to, it is still something I would like to know, because working with you guys would be the job of my dreams!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We do have internship programs available, but we only offer them in the summer. You can visit our [FAQ](http://www.riotgames.com/riot-internships/faq) page if you'd like to learn more about the program. ^-^
Thanks guys for all the comments I appreciate it! Guys like you keep my faith in LoL community high :D
I want a million dollars. LOLOLOLOL!

Just pointing out the obv, google riot internship. They have a whole page on it with all the positions and requirements and its always for the summer. Work on getting a portfolio and be an outstanding candidate since they get about 5k applicants for 30-40 slots. But if you standout they will notice.

http://www.riotgames.com/open-positions
